import time
import requests
from kafka import KafkaProducer

# API endpoint to fetch currency rates
API_ENDPOINT = "https://api.example.com/currency-rates"

# Kafka topic to store currency rates data
KAFKA_TOPIC = "currency-rates"

# Kafka bootstrap server URL
KAFKA_BOOTSTRAP_SERVERS = ["localhost:9092"]

# Create a Kafka producer instance
producer = KafkaProducer(bootstrap_servers=KAFKA_BOOTSTRAP_SERVERS)

while True:
    # Make API call to fetch currency rates data
    response = requests.get(API_ENDPOINT)
    currency_data = response.json()

    # Send currency rates data to Kafka topic
    producer.send(KAFKA_TOPIC, value=currency_data)

    # Wait for a few seconds before making the next API call
    time.sleep(10)
